item.title: Penguins prospect Murray sets AHL shutout record
item.description:
Pittsburgh Penguins goalie prospect Matthew Murray set an American Hockey League record by extending his shutout streak to 304 minutes and 11 seconds in the Wilkes-Barre/Scranton Penguins' 4-1 win against the Springfield Falcons on Sunday.
Murr...

item.title: Paille scores 2, Marchand adds another in Bruins 5-3 win over Detroit
item.description:
BOSTON - Daniel Paille scored two goals, one coming short-handed, and Brad Marchand added a short-handed goal to lift the Boston Bruins to a 5-3 victory over the Detroit Red Wings on Sunday.

item.title: Maple Leafs send Kadri home, shut down Robidas
item.description:
It was a busy day Sunday when the Toronto Maple Leafs convened for practice a day after a 6-1 loss to the St. Louis Blues at Air Canada Centre.
Forward Nazem Kadri missed practice after being sent home by interim coach Peter Horachek for being ...

item.title: Maple Leafs send Nazem Kadri home before practice for missing team meeting
item.description:
TORONTO - Toronto Maple Leafs forward Nazem Kadri missed a team meeting and was sent home before practice, interim coach Peter Horachek said.
Kadri was not on the ice for Sunday's practice, the morning after a 6-1 loss to the St. Louis Blues....

item.title: Penguins goalie prospect earns 4th straight shutout
item.description:

item.title: No hard feelings from Leafs or Blues after Phaneuf's hit on Oshie
item.description:
TORONTO - Dion Phaneuf's bone-jarring open-ice hit on T.J. Oshie and the response of St. Louis Blues captain David Backes left no sour feelings after the Toronto Maple Leafs' 6-1 blowout loss on Saturday.

item.title: Carey Price makes 29 saves to lead Canadiens past Coyotes 2-0
item.description:

item.title: Friesen, Comets hand Bulldogs third straight loss with 3-2 victory
item.description:

item.title: Ovechkin scores in return, Glencross gets 3 points and Capitals defeat Sabres, 6-1
item.description:

item.title: 3 early goals, Semyon Varlamov's 44 saves give Avalanche an easy 4-0 win over Blue Jackets

item.title: Killorn and Hedman score early in third period, Lightning rally to beat Stars 5-4
item.description:

After Killorn scored from the low slot at 3:40, Hedman gave Tampa Bay a 4-3 lead...

item.title: Stars C Tyler Seguin returns to lineup after missing 10 games with knee injury
item.description:

item.title: Ovechkin returns for Capitals against Sabres
item.description:
Washington Capitals captain Alex Ovechkin returned to the lineup against the Buffalo Sabres on Saturday.
Ovechkin, who had a lower-body injury, made his decision after skating in the warm-up.

item.title: After missing game, Alex Ovechkin returns to Capitals' lineup against Sabres
item.description:
WASHINGTON - NHL goals leader Alex Ovechkin returned to the Washington Capitals' lineup Saturday night against the Buffalo Sabres.

item.title: UMass beat Notre 4-3 in 5 overtimes, longest in Division I hockey history
item.description:

item.description:

item.title: Sabres prospect sets NCAA record for saves
item.description:
